name: Barlaam's Ritual
description:
A short adventure through the lands of Barlaam. Can you help the locals appease their overlord? Find the clues and precisely perform the ritual!

Controls (re-mappable).

  • Arrows = move
  • Space = action
  • Escape = pause
  • Alt-Enter = fullscreen

Attributions.

  • Sound effects - zapsplat.com
  • Testing - llxu
